text: <!channel> - reminder for those interested, it’s time to fill out your March Madness bracket.  You have until first thing in the morning on Thursday to complete your bracket (better make it wednesday night to be safe). Our bracket challenge thanks to matt is: <http://games.espn.go.com/tournament-challenge-bracket/en/group?invitesource=email&groupID=100692&inviteuser=Mjk4NTQ5OTYzA&ex_cid=invite-email-tcmen&groupp=d2F0ZXJhdmU%3D>

attachments.title: ESPN Tournament Challenge
